Package com.poloniex.api.client.rest

Interface PoloPrivateApiService

  • public interface PoloPrivateApiService
    PoloPrivateApiService interface describes the API to communicate with the Poloniex exchange server.

    Instances of PoloPrivateApiService are generated using Retrofit. The generated object will connect to Poloniex's private REST endpoints.

    Use PoloApiServiceGenerator to build PoloPrivateApiService object

    • Method Detail

      • getAccounts

        @GET("/accounts/")
retrofit2.Call<List<Account>> getAccounts()
        Account Information
        Returns:
        a list of all accounts of a user.

      • getAccountBalancesByType

        @GET("/accounts/balances")
retrofit2.Call<List<AccountBalance>> getAccountBalancesByType​(@Query("accountType")
                                                              String accountType)
        Account Balances by type
        Parameters:
        accountType - The account type. e.g. SPOT. Passing null will show all account types.
        Returns:
        a list of all accounts of a user with each account’s id, type and balances (assets).

      • getAccountBalancesById

        @GET("/accounts/{account_id}/balances")
retrofit2.Call<List<AccountBalance>> getAccountBalancesById​(@Path("account_id")
                                                            Long accountId)
        Account Balances endpoint
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account ID
        Returns:
        get a list of all accounts of a user with each account’s id, type and balances (assets).

      • accountsTransfer

        @POST("/accounts/transfer")
retrofit2.Call<AccountsTransferResponse> accountsTransfer​(@Body
                                                          AccountsTransferRequest accountsTransferRequest)
        Accounts Transfer: Transfer amount of currency from an account to another account for a user.
        Parameters:
        accountsTransferRequest - details for transfer
        Returns:
        response with transferId

      • getAccountsTransfers

        @GET("/accounts/transfer")
retrofit2.Call<List<AccountsTransferRecord>> getAccountsTransfers​(@Query("limit")
                                                                  Integer limit,
                                                                  @Query("from")
                                                                  Long from,
                                                                  @Query("direction")
                                                                  String direction,
                                                                  @Query("currency")
                                                                  String currency)
        Accounts Transfer Records: Get a list of transfer records of a user.
        Parameters:
        limit - The max number of records could be returned.
        from - it is 'transferId'. The query begin at ‘from', and the default is 0.
        direction - PRE, NEXT, default is NEXT
        currency - The transferred currency, like USDT. Default is for all currencies, if not specified.
        Returns:
        a list of transfer records of a user.

      • getAccountsTransferById

        @GET("/accounts/transfer/{id}")
retrofit2.Call<AccountsTransferRecord> getAccountsTransferById​(@Path("id")
                                                               Long id)
        Accounts Transfer Records by ID
        Parameters:
        id - transfer ID
        Returns:
        transfer record

      • getAccountsActivity

        @GET("/accounts/activity")
retrofit2.Call<List<ActivityResponse>> getAccountsActivity​(@Query("startTime")
                                                           Long startTime,
                                                           @Query("endTime")
                                                           Long endTime,
                                                           @Query("activityType")
                                                           Integer activityType,
                                                           @Query("limit")
                                                           Integer limit,
                                                           @Query("from")
                                                           Long from,
                                                           @Query("direction")
                                                           String direction,
                                                           @Query("currency")
                                                           String currency)
        Account Activity: Get a list of activities such as airdrop, rebates, staking, credit/debit adjustments, and other (historical adjustments).
        Parameters:
        startTime - (milliseconds since UNIX epoch) Trades filled before startTime will not be retrieved.
        endTime - (milliseconds since UNIX epoch) Trades filled after endTime will not be retrieved.
        activityType - Type of activity: ALL: 200, AIRDROP: 201, COMMISSION_REBATE: 202, STAKING: 203, REFERAL_REBATE: 204, CREDIT_ADJUSTMENT: 104, DEBIT_ADJUSTMENT: 105, OTHER: 199
        limit - The max number of records could be returned. Default is 100 and max is 1000.
        from - It is 'id'. The query begin at ‘from', and the default is 0.
        direction - PRE, NEXT, default is NEXT
        currency - The transferred currency, like USDT. Default is for all currencies, if not specified.
        Returns:
        List of account activity

      • getFeeInfo

        @GET("/feeinfo/")
retrofit2.Call<FeeInfo> getFeeInfo()
        Fee Info: Get fee rate for an account
        Returns:
        fee info

      • getDepositAddressesByCurrency

        @GET("/wallets/addresses")
retrofit2.Call<Map<String,​String>> getDepositAddressesByCurrency​(@Query("currency")
                                                                       String currency)
        Deposit Addresses: Get deposit addresses for a user
        Parameters:
        currency - the currency to display for the deposit address. If null is passed, the deposit addresses of all currencies will be displayed.
        Returns:
        map of deposit addresses with key being currency and value being address

      • getWalletsActivities

        @GET("/wallets/activity")
retrofit2.Call<WalletsActivities> getWalletsActivities​(@Query("start")
                                                       Long start,
                                                       @Query("end")
                                                       Long end,
                                                       @Query("activityType")
                                                       String activityType)
        Wallets Activity Records: Get adjustment, deposit, and withdrawal activity history within a range window for a user
        Parameters:
        start - the start UNIX timestamp of activities
        end - the end UNIX timestamp of activities
        activityType - The type of activity: adjustments, deposits and withdrawals. If no activity type is specified, activities of all types will be returned.
        Returns:
        wallet activity records

      • addNewCurrencyAddress

        @POST("/wallets/address")
retrofit2.Call<NewCurrencyAddressResponse> addNewCurrencyAddress​(@Body
                                                                 NewCurrencyAddressRequest newCurrencyAddressRequest)
        New Currency Address: Create a new address for a currency
        Parameters:
        newCurrencyAddressRequest - request with details for creating a new address
        Returns:
        new address

retrofit2.Call<WithdrawCurrencyResponse> withdrawCurrency​(@Body
                                                          WithdrawCurrencyRequest withdrawCurrencyRequest)
        Withdraw Currency: Immediately places a withdrawal for a given currency, with no email confirmation.
        Parameters:
        withdrawCurrencyRequest - request with details for withdrawal
        Returns:
        withdrawal number

retrofit2.Call<Order> placeOrder​(@Body

      • getOrders

        @GET("/orders")
retrofit2.Call<List<Order>> getOrders​(@Query("symbol")
                                      String symbol,
                                      @Query("side")
                                      String side,
                                      @Query("from")
                                      Long from,
                                      @Query("direction")
                                      String direction,
                                      @Query("limit")
                                      Integer limit)
        Open Orders: Get a list of active orders for an account
        Parameters:
        symbol - The symbol to trade,like BTC_USDT. Default is for all symbols if null is passed.
        side - BUY, SELL
        from - it is 'orderId'. The query begin at ‘from', and it is 0 when you first query.
        direction - PRE, NEXT
        limit - The max number of orders could be returned.
        Returns:
        list of orders

retrofit2.Call<Order> getOrderByOrderId​(@Path("id")

        Parameters:
        id - order id
        Returns:
        order details

      • cancelOrderByIds

        @HTTP(method="DELETE",
      path="/orders/cancelByIds",
      hasBody=true)
retrofit2.Call<List<CanceledOrder>> cancelOrderByIds​(@Body
                                                     CancelOrdersByIdRequest cancelOrdersByIdRequest)
        Cancel Multiple Orders by Ids: Batch cancel one or many active orders in an account by IDs.
        Parameters:
        cancelOrdersByIdRequest - request with orderIds and clientOrderIds to be cancelled
        Returns:
        list of order details

      • cancelAllOrders

        @HTTP(method="DELETE",
      path="/orders",
      hasBody=true)
retrofit2.Call<List<CanceledOrder>> cancelAllOrders​(@Body
                                                    CancelAllOrdersRequest cancelAllOrdersRequest)
        Cancel All Orders: Batch cancel all orders in an account.
        Parameters:
        cancelAllOrdersRequest - request with details for batch cancel
        Returns:
        list of order details

      • getOrderHistory

        @GET("/orders/history")
retrofit2.Call<List<Order>> getOrderHistory​(@Query("accountType")
                                            String accountType,
                                            @Query("type")
                                            String type,
                                            @Query("side")
                                            String side,
                                            @Query("symbol")
                                            String symbol,
                                            @Query("from")
                                            Long from,
                                            @Query("direction")
                                            String direction,
                                            @Query("states")
                                            String states,
                                            @Query("limit")
                                            Integer limit,
                                            @Query("hideCancel")
                                            Boolean hideCancel,
                                            @Query("startTime")
                                            Long startTime,
                                            @Query("endTime")
                                            Long endTime)
        Orders History: Get a list of historical orders in an account
        Parameters:
        accountType - SPOT is the default and only supported one.
        type - MARKET, LIMIT, LIMIT_MAKER (Default: all types)
        side - BUY, SELL (Default: both sides)
        symbol - Any supported symbol (Default: all symbols)
        from - An 'orderId'. The query begins at ‘from'.
        direction - PRE, NEXT The direction before or after ‘from'.
        states - FAILED, FILLED, CANCELED. PARTIALLY_CANCELED Multiple states can be specified and separated with comma. (Default: all states)
        limit - The max number of orders could be returned. (Default: 100)
        hideCancel - true or false. Whether canceled orders should not be retrieved. (Default: false)
        startTime - (milliseconds since UNIX epoch) orders updated before startTime will not be retrieved.
        endTime - (milliseconds since UNIX epoch) orders updated after endTime will not be retrieved.
        Returns:
        list of orders

      • setKillSwitch

        @POST("/orders/killSwitch")
retrofit2.Call<KillSwitchResponse> setKillSwitch​(@Body
                                                 KillSwitchRequest killSwitchRequest)
        Set Kill Switch: Set a timer that cancels all regular and smartorders after the timeout has expired.
        Parameters:
        killSwitchRequest - request with timeout details for creating kill switch
        Returns:
        kill switch details

      • getKillSwitch

        @GET("/orders/killSwitchStatus")
retrofit2.Call<KillSwitchResponse> getKillSwitch()
        Get Kill Switch: Get status of kill switch.
        Returns:
        kill switch details

      • getSmartOrderHistory

        @GET("/smartorders/history")
retrofit2.Call<List<SmartOrder>> getSmartOrderHistory​(@Query("accountType")
                                                      String accountType,
                                                      @Query("type")
                                                      String type,
                                                      @Query("side")
                                                      String side,
                                                      @Query("symbol")
                                                      String symbol,
                                                      @Query("from")
                                                      Long from,
                                                      @Query("direction")
                                                      String direction,
                                                      @Query("states")
                                                      String states,
                                                      @Query("limit")
                                                      Integer limit,
                                                      @Query("hideCancel")
                                                      Boolean hideCancel,
                                                      @Query("startTime")
                                                      Long startTime,
                                                      @Query("endTime")
                                                      Long endTime)
        Smart Orders History: Get a list of historical smart orders in an account
        Parameters:
        accountType - SPOT is the default and only supported one.
        type - STOP, STOP_LIMIT (Default: all types)
        side - BUY, SELL (Default: both sides)
        symbol - Any supported symbol (Default: all symbols)
        from - An 'smart orderId'. The query begins at ‘from'.
        direction - PRE, NEXT The direction before or after ‘from'.
        states - FAILED, FILLED, CANCELED. PARTIALLY_CANCELED. Multiple states can be specified and separated with comma. (Default: all states)
        limit - The max number of smart orders could be returned. (Default: 100)
        hideCancel - true or false. Whether canceled smart orders should not be retrieved. (Default: false)
        startTime - (milliseconds since UNIX epoch) smart orders updated before startTime will not be retrieved.
        endTime - (milliseconds since UNIX epoch) smart orders updated after endTime will not be retrieved.
        Returns:
        list of smart orders

      • getTrades

        @GET("/trades")
retrofit2.Call<List<Trade>> getTrades​(@Query("limit")
                                      Integer limit,
                                      @Query("endTime")
                                      Long endTime,
                                      @Query("startTime")
                                      Long startTime,
                                      @Query("from")
                                      Long from,
                                      @Query("direction")
                                      String direction)
        Trade History: Get a list of all trades for an account.
        Parameters:
        limit - default and max value is 100.
        endTime - (milliseconds since UNIX epoch) trades filled after endTime will not be retrieved.
        startTime - (milliseconds since UNIX epoch) trades filled before startTime will not be retrieved.
        from - A 'trade Id'. The query begins at ‘from'.
        direction - PRE, NEXT The direction before or after ‘from'.
        Returns:
        list of trades

      • getUserTradesByOrderId

        @GET("/orders/{orderId}/trades")
retrofit2.Call<List<Trade>> getUserTradesByOrderId​(@Path("orderId")
                                                   Long orderId)
        Trades by Order Id: Get a list of all trades for an order specified by its orderId.
        Parameters:
        orderId - the associated order's id (order's clientOrderId is not supported)
        Returns:
        list of trades
